verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Jesus triumphant When the stormclouds break And the loud thunder Bids the soul awake When biting blasts lay earthly projects low And one by one The fondest treasures go{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Jesus triumphant Through the fleeting years Jesus triumphant Spite of blinding tears High over all To hear Thy loving voice Which bids the heart Look upward and rejoice{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Jesus triumphant When in work for Thee Sad and disheartened No results we see When gathered force Of evil seems to win And work for Christ Seems lost in work of sin{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Jesus triumphant All along the line Triumphant Savior All Thy triumph mine For since I am A partner in Thy love My life on earth is Lived through Thee above{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Jesus triumphant When the spirit wings Upward and heav'nward To the King of kings And through the last Great triumph of Thy grace Triumphant saints shall see Thee face to face{/lang-eng}
